entry.title: Minion Gummies - 50ct
entry.summary:
Vendor: Regal Confections
Type: Bulk
Price: 5.99

A Tasty and Goofy Treat to Share

     What's more fun than a gummy treat that's shaped just like one of the loveable Minions from Despicable Me? The only thing we can think of is 50 of them! 

     Each gummy Minion is individually wrapped making this bag an easy and affordable option to hand out to trick-or-treaters on Halloween. They also make great piñata stuffers or snacks for a fantastic party!

250g | 1 bulk bag contains 50 individually wrapped pieces

entry.title: Popeye Candy Sticks - 24ct
entry.summary:
Vendor: Regal Confections
Type: Bulk
Price: 4.99

Nostalgic 50s Sweets to Share!

     Popeye Candy Sticks are the perfect treat to share with all the kids on Halloween, they bring back so many fond trick-or-treating memories! This 24 count bulk bag makes it easy to fill a bowl full of the retro classic candy to pass around or leave out for a fun party. 

60g | 1 bulk bag

entry.title: CCC Wiggly Gummi Worms - 2kg
entry.summary:
Vendor: Canada Candy Co.
Type: Bulk
Price: 24.99

One of the Most Classic Gummy Treats of them All!

     You may have had gummy worms plenty times before, but you haven't had them quite like these! Canada Candy Co.'s gummy worms are next to none, with their delicious recipe that's designed for more sharing equaling more smiles. With 3 super sweet flavour combos: Cherry-Lemon, Blue Raspberry-Orange, and Pineapple-Lime. These worms will have you hook, line, and sinker!

     This bulk candy is perfect for any event: weddings, baby showers, corporate events, candy buffets, or birthdays. Get together and share the sweetness of candy!

     The Canada Candy Company which was established in 2017 is highly dedicated to making quality bulk candy. All of their products are certified Kosher and Halal, and made in a peanut-free and gluten-free facility, ensuring everybody is able to enjoy the deliciousness of candy. All of their candy is made in Canada, so you can feel good about supporting a proudly Canadian business with each order. You won't be able to go back after trying their delectable sweets!

  • Made in Canada
  • Kosher Certified
  • Halal
  • Peanut-Free
  • Gluten-Free
